description.displayText:
Annie worked for our family full time for 16 months. Annie started working for us when our oldest was 2 years old and our youngest was 6 months old. 

Annie cared for our baby all day. Our oldest went to a Montessori school in the morning and Annie did drop offs and pick ups, and cared for our baby and our toddler for 3 hrs everyday until we got home from work.

Annie stopped working for us because we moved for work.

Annie is a wonderful nanny and our family loves her very much. Annie cared for the kids very well, made the kids happy and loved them very much. And they loved her back. They would color, paint Easter eggs, go to the park, read books, make costumes and plays, go to the library and have dance parties. Every school holiday they would make a bucket list of things to do and off they went having fun. That is a tradition Annie started and we've kept to this day.

Annie cared for our baby all day. Our oldest went to a Montessori school in the morning and Annie did drop offs and pick ups, and cared for our baby and our toddler for 3 hrs everyday until we got home from work.

Annie stopped working for us because we moved for work.

Annie is a wonderful nanny and our family loves her very much. Annie cared for the kids very well, made the kids happy and loved them very much. And they loved her back. They would color, paint Easter eggs, go to the park, read books, make costumes and plays, go to the library and have dance parties. Every school holiday they would make a bucket list of things to do and off they went having fun. That is a tradition Annie started and we've kept to this day.

description.displayText: Annie helped care for my three kids. She was extremely conscientious, kind, gentle, and flexible. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her.
